artist: Artist: Veronika Schäpers; Author: Shimizu Yoshinori
description: cardboard box with orange cover with title and text; yellow cartoon image of a bear at C with the phrase "Wow Wow Street"; contains gray softcover book with text in German and Japanese on decorated paper; also contains small black folder with white audio CD with label "Revised Jack and Betty"; lender's archive #206
markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 43
medium: Linocut; letterpress; compact disc; with commercial notebook cover
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers
title: Jack and Betty Forever (German and Japanese)
